name: Backztage Media
tag_list: corporate-website-design, ecommerce-website-design, flash-movies-design, content-management-system-cms, facebook-apps, iphone-apps, ipad-apps, android-apps, copywriting, translation, public-relations-services, search-engine-optimization-seo, search-engine
overview:
Based in Singapore, Hong Kong and China since 2005, BackZtage Media is a leading full-service interactive and digital marketing agency that offers an extensive range of services from creative to online marketing solutions for businesses.

Well-poised as a leading interactive agency and a digital marketing agency, we have proven our mettle in the areas of Corporate Website Design, Ecommerce Website Design, Flash Movies Design, Content Management System (CMS), Facebook Apps, iPhone Apps, iPad Apps, Android Apps, Copywriting, Translation, Public Relations Services, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Email Marketing Solution, Social Media Marketing, Web Application Development and Online Marketing solutions.

Find out more at

Corporate Website: www.backztagemedia.com Facebook: www.facebook.com/backztagemedia

Lifestyle Portal: www.backztage.com Facebook: www.facebook.com/backztage
